meta.description: Determine the number of brownies and lemon squares to make in order to minimize the total amount of fiber needed, given constraints on chocolate and lemon mix availability and product mix requirements.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products made by the bakery

params.name: chocolate_mix_requirement
params.description: Units of chocolate mix required per product

params.name: lemon_mix_requirement
params.description: Units of lemon mix required per product

params.name: fiber_requirement
params.description: Units of fiber required per product

params.name: chocolate_mix_available
params.description: Total units of chocolate mix available

params.name: lemon_mix_available
params.description: Total units of lemon mix available

vars.name: quantity
vars.description: Number of each product to make

objective.name: min_total_fiber
objective.description: Minimize the total amount of fiber needed

constraints.name: lemon_squares_greater_than_brownies
constraints.description: Number of lemon squares must be greater than number of brownies

constraints.name: at_least_40_percent_brownies
constraints.description: At least 40% of the items made must be brownies
